Our History

Trippin was founded in 2010 with a passion for travel and a vision to make the world more accessible and connected through exploration. Our founders, avid travelers themselves, recognized the transformative power of travel in enriching lives and fostering understanding between cultures. From humble beginnings as a travel blog, TravelNow has evolved into a leading online travel platform that caters to the needs of wanderlust-driven individuals seeking unforgettable experiences around the globe.

Our Mission

At Trippin, our mission is to inspire, empower, and enable people to embark on transformative journeys that create lasting memories. We aim to curate a comprehensive and user-friendly platform that brings together the best of travel information, services, and support. Through innovation and personalization, we strive to make the process of planning and booking a trip seamless, so travelers can focus on what truly matters â€“ experiencing the world and creating connections that transcend borders.

Our Vision

Our vision is to be the go-to destination for travel enthusiasts worldwide, fostering a vibrant community of explorers who share a love for adventure, discovery, and cultural immersion. We envision TravelNow as not just a travel booking site but a dynamic ecosystem where travelers can discover hidden gems, connect with like-minded individuals, and access valuable insights that enhance their journeys.

); } export default AboutUs;
